mapper.sql: a.id, a.name, a.loginName, a.tel, a.password, a.salt, a.status, a.createDate, a.role_id AS "role.id", a.department_id AS "department.id"
mapper.update: update t_user set name = #{name}, loginName = #{loginName}, tel = #{tel}, status = #{status}, role_id =#{role.id}, department_id = #{department.id} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select from t_user a where a.id = #{id}
SELECT , c.name AS "department.name" FROM t_user a LEFT JOIN t_department c ON a.department_id=c.id WHERE a.loginName = #{loginName}
